name: 塔尼特·菲尼克斯 Tanit Phoenix
intro: Tanit Phoenix is a South African fashion model actress and makeup artist.She is best known for her swimwear and lingerie photo shoots after appearing in a Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue in 2003 and in GQ magazine and FHM in the same year. Tanit is married to fellow South African actor, Sharlto Copley.
